name: css-text-overflow
description: Css module of single purpose classes for text overflow

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-text-overflow.css > css/css-text-overflow.css && tachyons src/css-text-overflow.css --minify > css/css-text-overflow.min.css && tachyons src/css-text-overflow.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
